name: Custom Gem Recipes
description: Adds extra gem upgrade/downgrade recipes with configurable gem counts.
author: MetalTxus

config.name: Upgrade cost (2-*)
config.description: Number of gems required to upgrade (will replace the default recipes).

config.name: Enable downgrade
config.description: Enable to add gem downgrade recipes (amount returned to be configured below).

config.name: Downgrade return (2-3)
config.description: Number of gems return by a downgrade.
